Configuration.Name: PrimoNewUI Chromium
Configuration.Author: Bill Jones, Tamara Marnell
Configuration.Description: Performs an Title, ISBN, and ISSN Search in the Primo New UI interface.

Setting.name: GoToLandingPage
Setting.Description: Defines whether you would like the Addon to go directly to the PrimoURL start page set in your config.

Setting.name: AutoSearchISxN
Setting.Description: Defines whether the ISxN search should be automatically performed when the form opens.

Setting.name: AutoSearchTitle
Setting.Description: Defines whether the Title search should be automatically performed when the form opens.

Setting.name: PrimoVE
Setting.Description: Defines whether this Primo installation is on VE.

Setting.name: BaseURL
Setting.Description: Defines the base of your Primo URL. See the ReadMe for an example.

Setting.name: DatabaseName
Setting.Description: Defines the Database Name of your Primo URL. See the ReadMe for an example.

Setting.name: SearchTab
Setting.Description: Defines the tab to search. See the ReadMe for an example.

Setting.name: SearchScope
Setting.Description: Defines the scope to search. See the ReadMe for an example.
